Html:
i was changing my pgm to use Excel2007_Writer and was reading user info from a MySQL DB
it choked (said spreadsheet had errors) - i tracked it down to a user that has french accented characters in some of the text fields
this was the 1st user with accented characters
do i have to do something special to handle accented characters?

mark

i am not sure what code page to use??
why doesn't the default accept french characters?

mark

UTF8 should do the trick...

Also, utf8_encode() is an option to use.
